twoSetSkill.name: Imaginary Space 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Receives a Charge upon becoming invisible. When invisibility ends, deal 200% ATK of Physical DMG to all enemies. Enemies hit by the next Basic ATK (including Charged and Combo ATKs) and during a short period afterwards will be immobilized for 3s.

threeSetSkill.name: Void Walk 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: When invisible, the host heals 2% HP and gains 2% SP every 0.9s.
